lead_paragraph: The day after the night before, the confusion and pain from the seismic defeat that cost Roy Hodgson his job as manager of England was still written large on his craggy face.

headline.print_headline: Hodgson Reluctantly Faces Music After Seismic Iceland Loss
headline.main: Hodgson Reluctantly Faces Music After Seismic Iceland Loss

snippet: The day after the night before, the confusion and pain from the seismic defeat that cost Roy Hodgson his job as manager of England was still written large on his craggy face....
